cont.entity_a: Worst customer service with long technical support wait times.

Router reboots frequently, even with no traffic. Drops wireless connection about once per hour, requiring VPN re-establishment. Router frequently disconnects and reboots, unresolved by firmware upgrade. Router frequently drops connections and has a clunky interface for advanced features. Router disconnects frequently and requires manual rebooting. Signal range is poor, with frequent internet signal loss.
cont.entity_b: Router has connectivity issues. Router frequently crashes even with the latest firmware. Router requires frequent power restarts. Mixed network performance is poor. Frequent crashes and poor customer service. Router has issues with time zone settings and frequent crashes. Router frequently crashes and VPN does not work.

cont.entity_a: Heavy duty router that worked for years. Simple installation with provided instructions. Inexpensive and easy to set up but not suitable for online gaming or consistent connectivity. Excellent speed and simple setup. Installation is easy with the latest firmware update.
cont.entity_b: Router is difficult to set up with missing parts. Advanced features suitable for SMB but difficult to set up. Router setup requires IT knowledge.

cont.entity_a: Advanced features poorly described in documentation with no samples.
cont.entity_b: Advanced features suitable for SMB but difficult to set up.

cont.entity_a: Signal strength and quality is inconsistent. Strong signal strength until about 50 meters away. Strong signals throughout a two-story house. Not suitable for long distances, has dead spots. Router has excellent range and performance through masonry walls.
Wireless link indicator LEDs do not behave as manuals describe.

cont.entity_b: G-Only mode does not work; mixed mode only connects at 11Mbps.

cont.entity_a: Outdated for modern standards but reliable as a used unit or low-cost system. No major problems with the router after 3 months of use. Router works well with OS X v.10.3.9. Works well as an access point/wi-fi router. Router works well with a mixed network of 802.11b and 802.11g devices. Router works well with VPN connections. Router works well with a PowerBook and Windows XP desktop. Router performs well but has weak signal strength.
cont.entity_b: Good for occasional use but not reliable for small business.

cont.entity_a: Offers WEP and WPA encryption, easy to manage. Router offers strong WPA security with 128-bit encryption.
Router works well with VPN connections.
cont.entity_b: VPN feature is not reliable. Router has issues with VPN endpoint and DynDNS-Client. VPN feature requires significant support.

cont.entity_a: Router frequently reboots and requires unplugging.
cont.entity_b: Router does not support SSH Sentinel software.
